file.name: datadog.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    tmp0:
      properties:
        hostname: {type: string}
        tags: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp1:
      properties:
        alert_type: {type: string}
        date_happened: {type: string}
        device_name: {type: string}
        host: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        payload: {type: string}
        priority: {type: string}
        resource: {type: string}
        tags: {type: string}
        text: {type: string}
        title: {type: string}
        url: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp2:
      properties:
        action: {type: string}
        hostname: {type: string}
        message: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp3:
      properties:
        handle: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        message: {type: string}
        resource: {type: string}
        url: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp4:
      properties:
        alert_type: {type: string}
        comment: {type: string}
        date_happened: {type: string}
        device_name: {type: string}
        host: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        is_aggregate: {type: string}
        priority: {type: string}
        resource: {type: string}
        tags: {type: string}
        text: {type: string}
        title: {type: string}
        url: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp5:
      properties:
        success: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp6:
      properties:
        apps: {type: string}
        is_muted: {type: string}
        last_reported_time: {type: string}
        metrics: {type: string}
        mute_timeout: {type: string}
        name: {type: string}
        tags_by_source: {type: string}
        up: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp7:
      properties:
        action: {type: string}
        hostname: {type: string}
      type: object
  securitySchemes: {}
info:
  contact: {email: frikky@shuffler.io, name: '@frikkylikeme', url: 'https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme'}
  description: Automated generation of Datadog 
  title: Datadog 
  version: 1.0.0
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  /api/add-tag:
    post:
      description: Add tag to host
      parameters:
      - description: A list of tags
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Tags
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Name of target host
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Hostname
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp0'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Datadog Add Tag
  /api/get-events:
    post:
      description: Get events
      parameters:
      - description: Event Identification
        example: '5364622753615309564'
        in: query
        name: Event ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp1'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Datadog Get Events
  /api/mute_host:
    post:
      description: Mute host
      parameters:
      - description: Write a comment on why you are muting the host
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Comment
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Name of target host
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Hostname
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp2'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Datadog Mute Host
  /api/post-comment:
    post:
      description: Post comment
      parameters:
      - description: Write a comment
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Comment
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp3'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Datadog Post Comment
  /api/query-events:
    post:
      description: Query events
      parameters:
      - description: The start time for events pulled
        example: '2020-03-12T00:00:00Z'
        in: query
        name: Start Time
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The end time for events pulled
        example: '2020-03-20T00:00:00Z'
        in: query
        name: End Time
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Priority of your events (low or normal)
        example: low
        in: query
        name: Priority
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Comma separated string of sources
        example: alert
        in: query
        name: Sources
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Comma separated string of tags
        example: check_type:api
        in: query
        name: Tags
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Set true to return all events within [start,end] time, else return
          outside the time set
        example: 'true'
        in: query
        name: Unaggregated
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp4'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Datadog Query Events
  /api/remove-tags:
    post:
      description: Remove all tags from host
      parameters:
      - description: Name of target host
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Hostname
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp5'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Datadog Remove All Tags
  /api/get-hosts:
    post:
      description: Get all host
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp6'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Datadog Search Host
  /api/unmute-host:
    post:
      description: Unmute host
      parameters:
      - description: Name of target host
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Hostname
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp7'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Datadog Unmute Host
tags:
- {name: SIEM & Log Management}
